abstract: John Paulson, the hedge fund guru, has jumped into the dispute over Dow Chemical‘s troubled deal to buy the rival chemical company Rohm & Haas. He is urging Dow to reverse tack and close the $15 billion acquisition — and he is even telling Dow how to go about doing it.
lead_paragraph: John Paulson, the hedge fund guru, has jumped into the dispute over Dow Chemical‘s troubled deal to buy the rival chemical company Rohm & Haas. He is urging Dow to reverse tack and close the $15 billion acquisition — and he is even telling Dow how to go about doing it.

headline.main: John Paulson Urges Dow to Close Rohm Deal

abstract: The media company, controlled by Rupert Murdoch, reported a quarterly loss of $6.41 billion on a write-down of Dow Jones & Co. and other assets, as the recession hit advertising revenue.
snippet: The media company, controlled by Rupert Murdoch, reported a quarterly loss of $6.41 billion on a write-down of Dow Jones & Co. and other assets, as the recession hit advertising revenue.
lead_paragraph: It seems that even Rupert Murdoch isn’t immune to the downturn battering media companies.

headline.main: News Corp. Loss Shows Trouble at Dow Jones
headline.print_headline: News Corp. Loss Shows Trouble at Dow Jones
